solution_line_template: The total number of cookies in {num_boxes} boxes is {num_boxes} boxes * {cookies_per_box} cookies / box = <<{num_boxes}*{cookies_per_box}={total_cookies_boxes}>>{total_cookies_boxes} cookies
The total number of cookies in {num_bags} bags is {num_bags} bags * {cookies_per_bag} cookies / bags = <<{num_bags}*{cookies_per_bag}={total_cookies_bags}>>{total_cookies_bags} cookies
There are {total_cookies_boxes} - {total_cookies_bags} = <<{total_cookies_boxes}-{total_cookies_bags}={difference_cookies}>>{difference_cookies} more cookies in the boxes than in the bags.
